content: With the Double-Combed Rooster Blood Soak equipped, while in Poisoned state, a sip of your Gourd removes the Poisoned state and moderately increases movement speed and critical hit chance.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Double-Combed_Rooster_Blood.md', within the main section titled 'Double-Combed Rooster Blood'.
The content is as follows:
With the Double-Combed Rooster Blood Soak equipped, while in Poisoned state, a sip of your Gourd removes the Poisoned state and moderately increases movement speed and critical hit chance.
